channel.title: Running Server (Probably a noob question with easy answer)
channel.description:
Why when I go to run my server (I can compile it fine) I get this message?
[code] Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Running Server (Probably a noob question with easy answer)
item.dc:creator: @Crucius Crucius
item.description:
@Crucius wrote:

Ok well now Im getting

Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx512m-cp Could not create Java Virtual Machien

Dude by the way add me on msn (black-end-soul@hotmail.com)

Read full topic
